# File 'lib/sprout/command_line.rb', line 27

def execute
  if version
    logger.puts "sprout #{Sprout::VERSION::STRING}"
  end
end

- (Object) parse!(options)

# File 'lib/sprout/command_line.rb', line 20

def parse! options
  if options.empty?
    handle_parse_error Sprout::Errors::UsageError.new("At least one parameter is required.")
  end
  super
end
